EQCrazed




A Night of Madness:Everquest will NEVER be the Same...






In the constant search to relieve lag during gameplay, I opted to download and install the latest graphic driver for my graphics card. It was an easy and familiar procedure. I rebooted after installation and logged onto Everquest to enjoy then newest little graphical details my new driver brought me. Boy was I SHOCKED! Thus I embarked on my everquest Psycho-nightmare!


The following screenshots are all that survived of a night of deep confusion and paranoia. I was much relieved the following morning when I reviewed these pictures, that they truely had occured. And in some ways now that I reverted to my previous driver, I miss the chaos of that night! Would you agree? I leave it to your judgement and enjoyment:)


Greater Faydark
Qeynos
Neriak, Lavastorm and Grobb


Please be patient and let the pictures fully load. It may take a minute:( Thank you





UPDATED 2/26/00 ~ Friday night marked another Very Odd Experience in Norrath. Somewhat of an "Adult" nature-
whatever THAT means...
I posted a few screenshots (the more Riske~ ones I will post when I have a bit of time...
They are all pretty funny regardless:) and all in all it was a Hilarious episode:)

After Hours inside the Third Gate

Thanks again and May You Have Far-reaching Eyes Thru Norrathian Fog......

Thanks for all the email and Encouragements:)

Also, many of you have requested how to fix this problem.
Some have also posted possible solutions. I solved it that night by re-installing
the driver I had been using previously to the weird one.


Thank you all so much for your encouragement and enjoyment! :)
